Some one's singing the yum yum song and doing a little dance!We popped in here for dinner on our first night in Barcelona - and it was the PERFECT introduction to Spanish tapas! We had a mass of food on the table - accompanied by Estrella beer with limon. SO GOOD. Mmmm, so here's what we had:EmpanadillesBombesCroquetesPebrots del padrogrilled garlic prawnsMy personal favs? Bombe and the grilled peppers. Flavor central. I could eat that combo with Estrella to wash it down every dayyyyyyy.
